incident_updates.body: Start time : 27/02/2023 23:00 UTC End time : 28/02/2023 04:00 UTC Service impact : The POP will be offline during the upgrade process (2 hours). There is no impact for the customers, except some additional latency to some Austrians customers. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our backbone infrastructure, we will be upgrading the version of a network equipment.

Start time : 28/02/2023 05:30 UTC End time : 28/02/2023 06:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need replace an equipment related to the cooling system.

Start time : 28/02/2023 06:00 UTC End time : 28/02/2023 07:00 UTC Service impact : Some latency might be observed during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our backbone infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment.

Start time : 28/03/2023 17:00 UTC End time : 28/03/2023 20:30 UTC Service impact : During the operation there will be a loss of pump redundancy. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing electrical work in will perform an intervention on the room's cooling module..
We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.
The maintenance has not begin yet. We apologize for the confusion.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
